title: Let's Watch TV: Golden Girls
description:
To honor the amazing life and work of Betty White, Fran and Joe watch a classic Golden Girls episode. Joe gets offended at Fran's lack of familiarity and Fran learns a few things about CBD before they re-cast a potential movie reboot of the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
